# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is how you can write the function:
```julia
function wrap_string(input_str::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input_str, " ")
    output_str = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(output_str) + length(word) <= text_width
            output_str *= "$word "
        else
            output_str *= "\n$word"
        end
    end
    return output_str
end
```
You can test the function with an example like this:
```julia
println(wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit"))
```
This will print:
```julia
Lorem ipsum
dolor sit amet 
consectetur 
adipiscing elit
```
